title: How to automate your workflows, optimize your conversion, and grow your business - Quora

response.answer_text: According to a survey report by Forrester, about 22% of businesses still lack excellence of process and automation in workflows. The critical aspects of customer satisfaction and growing revenue. If you want to have a whooping increase in the number of happy customers, you should focus on process excellence. And, process automation is the straightforward, efficient way to get started on that path. Business process automation definition is the use of technology to leverage efficiency and effectiveness of the processes. You can implement Business process automation in 4 ways: 1. Robotic Automation As the name suggests, it involves the use of robots for automation. These aren’t the mechanical kind of robots that you might be thinking, rather these are software robots. Often called botkeepers. The technology being called, robotic process automation (or RPA) is a metaphorical-based software technology for business process automation. It does all the regulated, recurring, and high-volume tasks for you. 2. Database Automation Handling and managing databases can be really rough sometimes. It is the most tedious work. Keeping records of all the data that keeps on repeating with time. Database Administrator (DBA) can be of great help that time. Database automation involve not only mimicking new databases, it also does all the testing and monitoring of the system. Plus, it keeps a check on the errors in the system and help rectify them. 3. Server Automation IT companies face the major issues related to the server errors. Server automation software helps in positioning of new server software, provisioning, managing inventory, patching and compliance operations quickly and effectively. 4. Department Automation Your business type may not require full automation but automating certain departments also yields great success. Our service offers you to customize the software as per your needs. All department needs are going to be specific. So, custom software can be built for them.
